name: aws-medical
description: A serverless application utilizing AWS Medical Transcribe and Medical Comprehension. Data are stored to a DynamoDB database.

scripts.create-build-dir: cd src && rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && mkdir static && cd static && mkdir css && mkdir js
scripts.copy-files: cp src/index.html src/build/ && cp src/favicon.ico src/build/ && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css src/build/static/css/
scripts.build-js: browserify src/static/js/main.js -o src/build/static/js/main.js -d && uglifyjs src/static/js/main.js -o src/build/static/js/main.js -c -m
scripts.build: npm run create-build-dir && npm run copy-files && npm run build-js
scripts.dev: npm run copy-bootstrap && npm run compile-js

author: Adam Fragkiadakis
